item.description:
Now is the time to be your most Vibrant Self! It is your time to SHINE! Spring is the time to cleanse! Learn simple and effective ways you can seasonally work with your body to maximize results! A detox does not have to be about scarcity and deprivation but rather lusciousness and abundance! Come experience the juiciness life has to offer!

 

Gluten-Free with Living Foods!

 

Come take a look into the world of raw, living foods where everything is GLUTEN-FREE. The idea of gluten-free can be overwhelming for many Americans who have become dependent on packaged, processed foods. Healthy options do exist! We will touch on time saving tips, sample simple recipe ideas enjoyed by all ages as well engage in a discussion on the importance of eating non-GMO foods, what they are and how they are easy to avoid with raw foods. Tasty treats will be available to tantalize your taste buds!
item.name: Gluten-free with Living Foods
